title: Cursive Swash... Bauer Bodoni?
content:
What font is this?

It almost looks like a cursive version of a Bodoni.... Maybe Bauer Bodoni. But I think it's an actual font. It's from a magazine and used more places throughout the publication.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [beautybook.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055/http:/typophile.com/files/beautybook.jpg) | 85.31 KB |
author: JollyRanching

comments.content:
Edwardian Script for everything except the /B

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/beaut1_6499.jpg)

"Buy this font online from:  
MyFonts: [http://www.myfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055/http:/www.myfonts.com/)  
Fonts.com: [http://www.fonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055/http:/www.fonts.com/)  
FontShop: [http://www.fontshop.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055/http:/www.fontshop.com/)  
Linotype Library: [http://www.linotype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032055/http:/www.linotype.com/)"
Ah you're right! Perfect, thank you very much!
